title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating multiple report parameters and setting default values for them, these default values are not displayed in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog. This issue occurs when the parameters are dragged to the layout.
OB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog does not display the default values of the report parameters after they have been dragged to the layout.
EB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog should display the default values of the report parameters, even after they have been dragged to the layout.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create several report parameters. 
2. Set default values for the report parameters. 
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog. 
5. Observe that the default values of the report parameters are not displayed.
